## Material/Surface information file "mat_scene11" ('Large room')

Author: 					Lukas Asp√∂ck / las@akustik.rwth-aachen.de
Date:						2016/07/11	

Notes:						This file contains information about the boundary conditions of the materials (7):
							"mat_scene11_linoleum", "mat_scene11_concrete", "mat_scene11_seating", "mat_scene11_brickwall", "mat_scene11_woodPanels", "mat_scene11_whitePanels", "mat_scene11_parquet"
														
							All relevant values are given in separate files in the csv-format							


## Material information:

Scenes:						11
Origin of data: 			Estimated data for absorption and scattering coefficients (based on database values and in situ measurements)
Angle of incidence:			random incidence
Frequency Range:			20 Hz - 20 kHz (31 third octave values, see line 1 in csv file)	

Absorption coefficients:	[x] (see line 2 in csv file)
Scattering coefficients: 	[x] (see line 3 in csv file) 
Impedance values:			[ ]

Data files:					/_csv/mat_scene11_linoleum.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene11_concrete.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene11_seating.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene11_brickwall.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene11_woodPanels.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene11_whitePanels.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene11_parquet.csv
